name: 郭忠義
objective: 智慧型代理人系統技術結合人工智慧、分散式計算與網際網路技術，逐漸成為未來重要的資訊技術。本課程介紹智慧型代理人系統之理論、架構與應用。學生透過此課程實做一個智慧型代理人系統，以瞭解代理人技術與應用。課程主要內容包括 - 1.多代理人理論與架構，2. 機器學習與代理人調適，3. 協調技術，4. 合作與競爭，5.賽局理論與決策，6.知識本體論， 7.網路服務。
schedule:
1, 2/21, Intelligent Agent Introduction, Agent Application,
2, 2/28, 和平紀念日  
3, 3/7, Proposition Login
4, 3/14, Agent Knowledge Representation
5, 3/21, Game theories and decision making
6, 3/28, Fuzzy Set Theory
7, 4/4, 清明節
8, 4/11, Fuzzy Set Theory
9, 4/18, Fuzzy Set Theory
10, 4/25, Neural Network
11, 5/2, Neural Network 
12, 5/9, Decision Tree and AB Search, Genetic Algorithm  
13, 5/16, Presentation I
14, 5/23, Presentation II
15, 5/30, Presentation III
16, 6/6,  Cooperative and competitive problem solving
17, 6/13, Agent Communication Language, Robot Agent
18, 6/20, Final
materials:
Text Book
Course materials are selected from a number of books, research documents and journal papers and will be delivered on each session.
Reference:
1. The Agent-Oriented Software Engineering Handbook, Springer, 2010. 
2. Nathan Griffiths, Kuo-Ming Chao, Agent-Based Service-Oriented Computing, Springer, 2010.
